{"id":469635016,"question_id":6,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 years, 11 months","timestamp":1616124434,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/469635016/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"14.3 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def convert(self, s: str, numRows: int) -> str:\n        if len(s) <= numRows or numRows==1:\n            return s\n        res = \"\"\n        for row in range(numRows):\n            cur = \"\"\n            if row == 0:\n                cur = s[0::2*(numRows-1)]\n            elif row == numRows-1:\n                cur = s[numRows-1::2*(numRows-1)]\n            else:\n                for j in range(row, len(s), 2*(numRows-1)):\n                    middle = \"\"\n                    if j + 2*(numRows - row - 1) < len(s):\n                        middle = s[j + 2*(numRows - row - 1)]\n                    cur += s[j] + middle\n            # print(cur)\n            res += cur\n            \n        return res\n\"\"\"\n\"PAHN\n AYLIIRGYAILRIPSI\"\n\"\"\"","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
